OverviewOur CompanyAs the premier global media and entertainment company, Warner Bros. Discovery offers audiences the world’s most differentiated and complete portfolio of content, brands, and franchises across television, film, sports, news, streaming, and gaming. We're home to the world’s best storytellers, creating world-class products for consumers.WBD is bringing together the scripted and the unscripted, the local and the global, the timely and the timeless. Taking the world’s greatest possibilities and making them a reality. Creating impact, inspiring imagination, and building connections. Here you can succeed, here you are supported, here you are celebrated. From brilliant creatives to technology trailblazers and beyond, join us as we step into the next chapter.It's an exciting time to join the Data & AI product management teamData & Artificial Intelligence is one of our CEO's top areas of focus and investment. He also sees our organization as the brain trust that enables everyone to make smarter decisions fasterThis is a unique opportunity to define foundational decisions of our data & AI capabilities, as we build our enhanced streaming product and scale it globally.You will play a key leadership role in building and scaling our org's product management function from the ground up.It's fun and rewarding to work at a media & entertainment leader with unparalleled breadth and quality of content. Every day we bring magic into people’s lives, shape cultural conversations globally, and define the future of world-class storytelling.ResponsibilitiesAs a Director of Data & AI Product Management, you willLead co-creation, execution and evolution of the vision, strategy and roadmap of your product areas to deliver value at scale and delight usersDeliver, innovate, and grow a portfolio of data & AI products with crafted user-centric experiences in close collaboration with analysts, data scientists, data and machine learning engineers.Build trusted and impactful cross-functional partnerships within and outside Data & AI. Communicate and influence effectively up, across, and down to align and unite teams.Hire, inspire and coach product managers to create impact and grow their careersElevate and scale our product management function in terms of best practices, processes, and communityQualificationsYou will thrive here with the following skills and experience12+ years of work experience, preferably in consumer products, technology or media & entertainment9+ years of product management experience with at least 4 years leading ML-powered products that users love and delivering a track record of business results. Experience in growth product management or data governance & privacy is a plus6+ years of experience managing experienced and first-time product managers Humility, scrappiness and demonstrated ability to motivate teams across organizational boundaries, delivering impact fast amid ambiguity, change, and resource constraintsSavviness to know when to lead, partner or followExceptional written and oral communication across mediums and audiencesPassion for data and artificial intelligence. Voracious learner who keeps abreast of latest trends and innovation in the space.Fluency in SQL to analyze data and identify insightsIn compliance with local law, we are disclosing the compensation, or a range thereof, for roles in locations where legally required. $145,250 - $269,750 salary per year. Other rewards may include annual bonuses, short- and long-term incentives, and program-specific awards. In addition, Warner Bros. Discovery provides a variety of benefits to employees, including health insurance coverage, an employee wellness program, life and disability insurance, a retirement savings plan, paid holidays and paid time off (PTO).Warner Bros Discovery requires vaccination for employment consideration, except where prohibited by law. Discovery will consider requests for exemption from this requirement upon an offer of employment. Employees with approved exemptions due to health or religious reasons must abide by weekly rigorous COVID-19 testing protocols.Warner Bros Discvoery is an equal opportunity employer. Warner Bros Discovery is committed to being an employer of choice, not just a good place to work, but a great and inclusive place to work. To that end, we strive to recruit and maintain a workforce that meaningfully represents the diverse and culturally rich communities that we serve. Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to their race, color, religion, national origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, protected veteran status or disabled status or, genetic information.We will consider for employment all qualified applicants, including those with criminal histories, in a manner consistent with the requirements of applicable state and local laws, including but not limited to all local Fair Chance Ordinances.EEO is the LawPay Transparency Policy StatementCalifornia Job Applicant Privacy PolicyTransparency In CoverageIf you are an individual with a disability and need an accommodation during the application process, please send an email request to HR@discovery.com
